text: Guys, is HubSpot down? I get a 502 bad gateway on most of the pages
everyone in our office at least can't access HubSpot

Hello, Is it possible to implement the login functionality in HubSpot? Like giving Login and sign up option to the user and then showing the data as per user? I am thinking about using hubdb table and then cross-checking user credential against it. But Please suggest am I thinking in the correct direction? Please respond if possible with example.
<@UJ2QKB849> if you client is on Enterprise there is a login sytem you can use for them

Thanks Chad, Can u send me any website link who is using this(login system by HubSpot) functionality. I am not very clear that Enterprise login system can solve my problem. I want the login system for this <http://specnt.com/>. Is it possible to do it in HubSpot?
